sentences: Jõu ülekandeks vajalik on korrektne pöörlemine.
See jõu on tähtis mehhanismi toimimisel.
context: The Estonian word 'jõu' is the genitive singular form of the noun 'jõud'. It means 'of force', 'of power', or 'of strength'. In technical contexts, it can also refer to a specific type of gear (balanssiir) used for transmitting force in mechanisms like pumps and balances. As the genitive case, it indicates possession or relationship - something belonging to or related to force/power/strength.
